data.text: @VodafoneUK Anyway, muting you now because you seem utterly unable as a company to provide useful data, and I don't want notifications through the night. 6 hours is plenty of time to answer a simple question about a product you currently sell and you can't even do that.

@VodafoneUK Which means you're just worrying customers and selling them devices based on false information and a broken checker. So understandably, I'd quite like facts. You seem incapable of providing them, so there we are.

@VodafoneUK Oh, and as a final detail, despite several emails to the effect that it's not compatible and despite lots of messages from a "Nirav" stating that it's not compatible, the information on the device says "Mobile voice network type - 4G" which suggests you're completely wrong.

@VodafoneUK Given I've been talking to your staff in one fashion or another now for 6 hours and none of you seem to have a clue, the sensible option is to give up on you, and go away and investigate better mobile phone providers. When I've done that I'll be shifting else. END.

@VodafoneUK So either your website is wrong, and you're selling goods that are not fit for the purpose for which they're sold OR your rep is wrong and it is fit for service. And I can't get a straight answer whether you've sold me junk with an extended contract or not.
@VodafoneUK And I'm literally quoting your rep there stating it's not compatible with 4G Calling and quoting your website that states that all the phones you sell now ARE compatible with 4G calling.
@VodafoneUK I‚Äôll be haggling with the locals in Hawaii #DreamHoliday #VeryMeRewards

@VodafoneUK They made it clear that this phone - https://t.co/vwZVxIOAHd - which you sell NOW as compatible with your network - won't be compatible with 4G calling as of next year. (Summarising their replies)
So I can't trust you any more and after 20 years going elsewhere.

@VodafoneUK Other team member basically convinced me to cancel my (and my family's) service with you, because they refused to answer my question definitively and suggested you're knowingly selling goods that will be incompatible in less than 12 months.
@VodafoneUK Mine is to feed the penguins in Italy... does Italy have many penguins?üòï#DreamHoliday
@VodafoneUK 10 minutes after giving them the small piece of info they seemed to think they need, still no response.
@VodafoneUK 25 minutes and finally a reply, but you've gone back to air silence after being given the same information.
@VodafoneUK Over 20 minutes and no reply.
@VodafoneUK You asked me to DM you after you gave shoddy service. So I did. You haven't replied. Any chance you could answer basic questions about products you've sold and currently sell?

@VodafoneUK @CostaCoffee You asked me to DM you after you gave shoddy service. So I did. You haven't replied. Any chance you could answer basic questions about products you've sold and currently sell?
@VodafoneUK You asked me to DM you after you gave shoddy service. So I did. You haven't replied. Any chance you could answer basic questions about products you've sold and currently sell?
@VodafoneUK You asked me to DM you after you gave shoddy service. So I did. You haven't replied. Any chance you could answer basic questions about products you've sold and currently sell?
@VodafoneUK 15 minutes later, you've not replied to the DM. Very quick to reply to public messages, but totally ignoring DM's.

And guess, no reply from @VodafoneUK 
Anyone actually like their phone network that isn't Vodafone? Looking to switch at this point. https://t.co/T75KUNVifE

@VodafoneUK Well, I've sent a copy of this entire thread, and answers to the security questions you ask and the exact details to your DM address.
I'm assuming you won't actually reply with helpful answers at this point based on your reponse.
@VodafoneUK #DreamHoliday I‚Äôm going to Costa Rica to Wrestle an Aardvark ü§£ https://t.co/ny1Lzcuwhx

So, @motorolaUK ( @MotorolaSupport ) do you know if the Moto G9 Play as sold by @VodafoneUK  will be compatible with their network as of next year? They're not answering questions and claiming it both is and isn't compatible. Do you know about your phones? https://t.co/Did30ldbEL

@VodafoneUK You sell the product it's in your shop here:
https://t.co/FFUgjLiTGd
Will it have to be binned next year if bought today? ie are you selling products not suitable for purpose.
If it is compatible why are your systems saying otherwise when a customer has bought it?
@VodafoneUK Re-reading this, are you saying you won't bother answering a clear customer question about your products ?

@VodafoneUK However if I look to find a "compatible replacement" - it comes up with my phone Moto G9 Play.
I can provide you with the same information you already have on DM but you have enough information.
@VodafoneUK For example, if I enter my phone IMEI into your checker it comes back with this: https://t.co/jU43QzXiRr
@VodafoneUK 2) Why did you send me a message on 26/1/22 claiming that THIS phone will not work as of 2023 - ie telling not fit for the purpose for which it was sold?
@VodafoneUK Hi Jason. That was difficult when there was no network connectivity! Seems to be back up now.
@VodafoneUK Your answers will determine pretty much whether I stick with Vodafone or not. (And likely result in the entire family shifting too of course)
@VodafoneUK Or are you saying that you can't tell me if the device YOU sold me (that YOU ARE STILL selling) is compatible or not without me repeating the same information via DM?

So @VodafoneUK . You sold me a Moto G9 Play in Nov with a 2 year contract (you didn't deliver till well into December, mind) . Less than 2 months later you tell me it's not suitable for use on your network 10 months from now. So not suitable at time of sale. 1/2

@bt_uk I shouldn't have to wait for anything, I was assured I'd be on by yesterday. Moved house with autistic teenagers and you've left us with no TV no Internet, after poaching me from @VodafoneUK claiming to be cheaper! Then you try doubling my charges! What a joke!

tweets.text: @sparkslabs_com The Moto G9, if purchased from Vodafone though your Vodafone account should be Wi-Fi calling compatible, even after the down grading of 3G in 2023. If you are having issues with your device, please let us know and we can discuss the options.  Des

@VodafoneUK Oh, and as a final detail, despite several emails to the effect that it's not compatible and despite lots of messages from a "Nirav" stating that it's not compatible, the information on the device says "Mobile voice network type - 4G" which suggests you're completely wrong.

@VodafoneUK Given I've been talking to your staff in one fashion or another now for 6 hours and none of you seem to have a clue, the sensible option is to give up on you, and go away and investigate better mobile phone providers. When I've done that I'll be shifting else. END.

@VodafoneUK I bought this device FROM YOU Nov/Dec 21 https://t.co/FFUgjLiTGd

@AviatressMiles Amazing! Glad you managed to speak to us! If you need anything from us, you know where we are. You can also head over to our support centre to see if you can find your answer there in the future too üëâ https://t.co/MQcgqGv2IT - Hope you enjoy the rest of your day! Liam

@kelz_1980 It can be more difficult to reach the team during busy periods and we apologise for the inconvenience. Currently our dedicated team on 03333040191 is the only method of requesting a home broadband transfer. Lucy

@AviatressMiles Hi Aammanda üëã I'm sorry to hear that you've not had the best experience, especially after you've been with us for so long. Can you tell me more about what's happened and I'll do my best to turn things around üîé Ryan

@Suffolkngood1 Hi Bruce, sorry to hear the line has cut off when getting in touch. Drop us a DM with the reason for the call and your Vodafone mobile or account number? I‚Äôll see how I can help you. When you send a DM, you‚Äôll be greeted by our BOT. Select ‚ÄòGet Started‚Äô and ‚ÄòAsked to DM‚Äô Lou https://t.co/zZC6gSR1Ak

@kelz_1980 Hey üëã Sorry you're facing trouble reaching us. Our Broadband Home Moves Team are only contactable via 03333040191. They may be busier at certain times of the day. The team are open from 8am - 8pm daily, you may find it easier to get through earlier or later in the day. Lucy
@SpenyBoy73 @Refugee_Assist On top of this we also work with @SapperSupport to help their initiative and free PTSD helpline‚ù§Ô∏è

@ladyvaio Before sending you a new device Donna, we'd always try to repair your current handset first. You can speed this process up by popping your handset into a local store. They'll check it over and get it sent off to the repair centre for you.
Mark
@kirstyhearfiel1 Hi Kirsty üëã Thanks for taking the time to share such great feedback! It's lovely to hear about our customers receiving excellent service üòÄ Millie
